Skysunder.name: Skysunder
Skysunder.description:
This +1 striking clan dagger bears the face of a stern dwarven god, his beard and features forming part of the blade.

Forming the Bond The PCs complete the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.w00PBRjENqJa7Vxu]{Rite of Repatriation}.

Advancing the Bond Protect, recover, and restore dwarven culture and people.

Minor Gifts deadly spark, divine retribution, word of faith; divine retribution Strikes made with Skysunder gain the deadly d4 trait.

Major Gifts holy light, propelling winds
